sentences.english: A trolley equipment for rail profile measurement is developed.
sentences.chinese: 研製了一種手推式鋼軌外形幾何尺寸測量系統。

sentences.english: The main characteristics of the rail steel are low manganese and high carbon which content is being closed to eutectoid.
sentences.chinese: 其成分特徵是碳含量在共析點左右的高碳低錳鋼軌鋼。

sentences.english: High speed rail engineering developments need high efficiency welding.
sentences.chinese: 高速軌道工程建設急需鋼軌高效化焊接技術。

sentences.english: A small crane for rail replacement at Hua-Lien Station.
sentences.chinese: 花蓮站內的鋼軌起重用鐵擔車。

sentences.english: This Chapter does not cover railway or tramway rolling-stock designed solely for running on rails.
sentences.chinese: 本章不包括僅可在鋼軌上運行的鐵道及電車道車輛。

sentences.english: The rail grinding can solve the fatigue damage of the rail effectively.
sentences.chinese: 鋼軌打磨可以有效解決鋼軌的疲勞傷損。

sentences.english: The rail grinding can solve the fatigue damage of the rail effectively.
sentences.chinese: 鋼軌打磨可以有效解決鋼軌的疲勞傷損。

sentences.english: Road bed is the subgrade on which are laid the ballast, ties and rails.
sentences.chinese: 路基就是上面鋪着道渣，枕軌和鋼軌的底基。

sentences.english: The characters of rail out-line quenching are presented which is achieved at Baotou Steel.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了包鋼新建鋼軌離線全長淬火工藝的特點。

sentences.english: The rail's existing profile is maintained by using special gauge corner grinding stones.
sentences.chinese: 鋼軌斷面使用特殊的軌距邊角磨石來保養。

sentences.english: The automatic positioning mechanism is mainly used for automatically positioning the device on the steel rail in a gapless way.
sentences.chinese: 此種機構主要用於鋼軌上對設備的自動無隙定位。

sentences.english: Besides, some counter measures alleviating the damage are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 針對性地提出了關於減輕鋼軌傷損的對策措施。

sentences.english: The Elegant Rails railing no longer clips through the post when placed diagonally .
sentences.chinese: 優雅的鋼軌欄杆不再剪輯後通過時，放在對角線。

sentences.english: The phase transition is caused by wheel sliding on the rail.
sentences.chinese: 相變是由於車輪在鋼軌上滑行造成的。

sentences.english: The manufacturer shall be responsible from the rail equipment and the concrete sleepers.
sentences.chinese: 供應商應對鋼軌設備和混凝土枕木負責。

sentences.english: Inclusion has great influences on the distribution of elastic- plastic stress in railhead.
sentences.chinese: 夾雜物對鋼軌的彈塑性應力場有較大影響。
